responses: Hi there, nice to meet you!
I am a recent graduate with a diverse background in computer science, business, and data analytics/machine learning.
This bot was made using a feed forward neural net implemented and trained with PyTorch.

Currently I am working as a Software Developer. In the past I worked as a Business Analyst where my responsibilities revolve mainly around project management duties and writing requirements documents.

I graduated recently from Simon Fraser University with a Joint Degree in Computing Science and Business. I also have the Business Analystics and Decision Making Certificate from the Beedie School of Business.
